name: My Asset Planner
description: Ideal for those who are looking to manage their business assets, this tracker helps you keep track of business assets and its details such as assets basics, asset maintenance, financials, performance and much more.Are you looking for a tracker to keep track of assets associated with your business operations and manage your finances effectively?This tracker is perfect to add asset basic details, schedule maintenance strategies, check asset financials, check performance, check compliance, maintain
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Set up Operational Management of assets such asAsset Details,Schedule Maintenance,Check FinancialsandAssess Performanceetc.; Check for Regulatory Compliances such asAsset Compliance, Documents Setupand AssessReviews of Assets.; Get a complete detailed overview of all assets added, their performance and other metrics.
